0.2.name: wordpress/wp-seedbank
0.2.description:
Add a seedbank to your WordPress-powered website. Registered users can post seed offers and requests for others to search, making it easier to swap seeds and grow your community.

Features include:

  • Ability to import a comma-separated values file to create seed exchanges in batches.
  • Ability to customize verbage to suit a specific community's needs.
